summary: An evil, sadistic Leprechaun goes on a killing rampage in search of his beloved pot of gold.
cast: Warwick Davis|Jennifer Aniston|Ken Olandt|Mark Holton|Robert Hy Gorman|Shay Duffin|John Sanderford|John Voldstad|Pamela Mant|William Newman|David Permenter|Raymond C. Turner|Heather Kennedy|Tim Garrick|Alexandra Sachs|Brandon Sachs|Klexius Kolby|David Tripet
title: La noche del duende
